column1: Local Foods////The pork inside the Banh Mi was juicy and succulent thanks to the flavorful marinade
column2: which was slightly sweet and spicy. The fresh vegetables inside of the sandwich were crisp and refreshing
column3: providing a nice contrast to the sambal hot sauce. The French bread was perfect
column4: and hugged the delicious sandwich innards flawlessly. It's been about half an hour since I finished every bite of this sandwich
column5: but I can't stop thinking about it. I have honestly NEVER had a sandwich this good. My mom ordered this sandwich as well
column6: and she shared the same emotions as me. Yes. Eating this amazing sandwich was an emotional experience.
